original_text: Solomon went up to the bronze altar which was in front of the Lord's special tent. He offered 1,000 burnt offerings on the altar to the Lord.
korean_text: 여호와 앞 곧 회막 앞에 있는 놋 제단에 솔로몬이 이르러 그 위에 천 마리 희생으로 번제를 드렸더라

sentences.original_text: which was in front of the Lord's special tent
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 주의 특별한 장막 앞에 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: on the altar to the Lord
